Name: Demolition permits.
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to demolition permits.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Housing and Buildings
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
Section 1. The administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 28-105.1.2 to read as follows:  

§28-105.1.2 Notification to fire department of demolition permit.  The commissioner, in consultation with the fire commissioner, shall promulgate rules within one hundred and twenty days of the enactment of this section, establishing standards, procedures and requirements for the department’s electronic notification of the fire department when a demolition permit is issued for any building. Such notification shall  include information sufficient to inform the fire department of the location of the building that is the subject of such permit and shall be made at least (i) ten business days prior to the issuance of such permit if the building is seventy five feet or more in height and at least (ii) three business days prior to the issuance of such permit for all other buildings.
§2. This local law shall take effect immediately.

LS # 6901
12/10/08
RCC
